EmailTemplate.name: New Photos: Nurturing Chase
EmailTemplate.subject: Still interested in joining Envato Elements?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Envato Elements Invite
Still Interested?
New Earning Opportunity for Photographers
Hi {!Lead.Company}
A short time ago you responded to our invite to upload photos to Envato Elements and the PhotoDune marketplace.
We wanted to follow up as we’ve yet to hear from you. If you're still interested please create a free Envato Author Account. https://author.envato.com/join
Once you’ve created your Envato Market account, please send me your username so we can set up your photo manager!
Feel free to ask any questions you may have and hope to hear from you soon! :-)
Regards, {!User.FirstName} Envato Elements
Envato Elements
© 2017 Envato Elements Pty Ltd. (ABN: 87 613 824 258) 121 King Street, Melbourne VIC 3000 Australia
To opt out of further emails from us about joining Elements, simply reply to this email with the word "Unsubscribe" in the subject line.
